quote: Shame ain't black, like dirt, like I always thought it was. Shame be the color of a new white uniform your mother ironed all night to pay for, white without a smudge or a speck a work-dirt on it.
quote_letters: SHAME AINT BLACK LIKE DIRT LIKE I ALWAYS THOUGHT IT WAS SHAME BE THE COLOR OF A NEW WHITE UNIFORM YOUR MOTHER IRONED ALL NIGHT TO PAY FOR WHITE WITHOUT A SMUDGE OR A SPECK A WORK-DIRT ON IT
